review: I was not impressed when I unpacked it - the remote control feels like it was made with plastic the consistency of freezer bags. But it does work.The network connectivity is flaky enough from this item to interfere with watching and in generating lots of warnings. In contrast to running the same things on the PC I use to drive the content for our TV where the wireless signal is consistently excellent.The search function is clumsy - but it is clumsy on a PC, it is a native fault with Amazon - it is just enormously more clumsy on a device that has to use a point and click interface to generate text.The selection of apps is all but worthlessNot absolutely useless but it did not any value at all.
